title: NEWLY renovated 1 Bed 1 Bath home located in the heart of Houston
posting_body: Amazing 2 br,1 ba, home In Buffalo, NY !
On the first floor, there is an open layout family room, dining area and kitchen.
The second level is occupied by a versatile loft that provides additional shared living space and four bedrooms, including the owner’s suite featuring a private bathroom and walk-in closet.
Two car garage with automatic garage door opener.
Central air and heating includes all appliances Microwave, dishwasher, Refrigerator, and washer and dryer included in laundry room.
First month rent plus deposit will be collected if tenant is accepted.
Candidates will need to apply with third party vendor for background check and application process.
Asking $800.00 per month through private party, High speed WI-fi internet, Electric Stove, Refrigerator, Slider to Balcony, Air Conditioning/Heating.
Please Give me your personal phone number.
